column5: Took a run up to the lake to look at things. About 10 inches of snow. Surprised to see the Narrows frozen. She's been cold.
How's the lake out front of your place?...hard to tell from our shore...our bay (Taites) and Nogie's Creek Bay are frozen as far as far as the eye can see...
Frozen too Beans. Some dark gray ice over the shoal. Likely current keeping it thin.
At least 100' feet of pack ice here on Erie out front, or back depending. It looks good so far for Fish Farmer.
I'm on the secondary channel on Buckhorn Lake. Looks like there's some melting going on. I wonder if they've finally opened the dam?
